NOTICE_DATA.ORIGINAL_CPV: Musical instruments, sport goods, games, toys, handicraft, art materials and accessories

CODIF_DATA.RP_REGULATION: European Union, with participation by GPA countries
CODIF_DATA.HEADING: 01B03

TITLE.P: 991_18 Supply of Early Years and Curriculum Product Ranges

SHORT_DESCR.P: Framework for the supply of early learning and curriculum resources for delivery to the ESPO distribution centre, Leicester and for delivery direct to individual customer establishments.
Supply of curriculum ranges for delivery to the ESPO distribution centre, Leicester and for delivery direct to individual customer establishments.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: The framework agreement has the option to extend for up to a further 24 months. The total estimated value stated in Section II.1.7 includes the option period.

SHORT_DESCR.P: Supply of early learning ranges for delivery to the ESPO distribution centre, Leicester and for delivery direct to individual customer establishments.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: The framework agreement has the option to extend for up to a further 24 months. The total estimated value stated in Section II.1.7 includes the option period.

SHORT_DESCR.P: Supply of educational construction systems for delivery to the ESPO distribution centre, Leicester and for delivery direct to individual customer establishments.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: The framework agreement has the option to extend for up to a further 24 months. The total estimated value stated in Section II.1.7 includes the option period.

SHORT_DESCR.P: Supply of early outdoor play and garden furniture for delivery to the ESPO distribution centre, Leicester and for delivery direct to individual customer establishments.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: The framework agreement has the option to extend for up to a further 24 months. The total estimated value stated in Section II.1.7 includes the option period.
